name: Batteryman Duplex
text: If this card is Summoned: You can pay 500 LP; add 1 "Batteryman" card, or "Short Circuit" from your Deck to your hand, except "Batteryman Duplex", also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except "Batteryman" monsters. (Quick Effect): You can banish this card from your hand or GY, then target 1 "Batteryman" monster you control; it gains 1600 ATK until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Batteryman Duplex" once per turn.
